#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int Find (string S, int M)
{
	int n = S.length ();
	int res = 0, temp = 0;
	for (int i = 0; i < M; i++)
		if (S[i] == 'B')
			res++;
	temp = res;
	for (int i = M; i < n; i++)
	{
		if (S[i - M] == 'B')
			temp--;
		if (S[i] == 'B')
			temp++;
		res = min (res, temp);
	}
	return res;
}

int main ()
{
	int T, M;
	string S;
	cin >> T;
	while (T--)
	{
		cin >> S;
		cin >> M;
		cout << Find (S, M) << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
